src:
福州赛何济霆/谭强狂救4赛点 韩呈恺/周昊东胜强敌

06 Nov 2019, 02:56

【新浪体育5日讯】2019年世界羽联S750级赛事福州羽毛球公开赛展开正赛首日的较量，男双比赛中，7号种子韩呈恺/周昊东19-21、21-16、21-16逆转日本组合保木卓朗/小林优吾。保木卓朗/小林优吾在世锦赛获得亚军后连续五站比赛一轮游（常州1000、仁川500、欧登塞750、巴黎750、福州750）。另一场比赛，何济霆/谭强在决胜局挽救了4个赛点，最终以22-20、13-21、27-25险胜俄罗斯组合伊万诺夫/索佐诺夫。首局比赛，何济霆/谭强在5-5平后一直处于领先，一度以13-7领先。在19-15时，中国组合连续浪费了四个盘点机会，被对手追平比分。好在两人还是顶住压力，在20-20平后连得两分拿下第一局。第二局，何济霆/谭强全程处于被动，被对手牢牢压制，最终以13-21输掉了这一局。决胜局，双方争夺激烈，何济霆/谭强在11-9领先时连丢了5分。后半段，中国组合在18-20落后情况下连续挽救赛点将比分扳平。在21-22和22-23时，中国组合又是化解赛点。两人也浪费了3个赛点机会，最终在25-25平时连得了2分险胜。女双首轮比赛中，李汶妹/郑雨21-9、21-8横扫印度组合蓬纳帕/斯基，董文静/冯雪颖21-15、21-9横扫马来西亚组合许嘉雯/叶铮雯。混双较量中，鲁恺/陈露22-24、18-21不敌5号种子、韩国组合徐承宰/蔡侑玎。
text:
Fuzhou Sai He Jizhen / Tan Qiang savior 4 match point Han Chengqi / Zhou Wei Dong Sheng strong enemy

06 Nov 2019, 02:56

[Sina Sports 5th News] In 2019, the World Badminton S750 class Fuzhou Badminton Open was held on the first day of the competition. In the men's doubles match, No. 7 seed Han Chengyu / Zhou Yidong reversed 19-21, 21-16, 21-16 Japanese combination Bao Muzhuo Lang / Kobayashi Ugo. Bao Muzhuo Lang / Kobayashi Ugo won the first round of five consecutive races after the runner-up in the World Championships (Changzhou 1000, Incheon 500, Odense 750, Paris 750, Fuzhou 750). In another match, He Jizhen/Tan Qiang saved four match points in the tiebreaker and eventually won the Russian group Ivanov/Sozonov by 22-20, 13-21 and 27-25. In the first game, He Jizhen/Tan Qiang was in the lead after 5-5, and once led 13-7. At 19-15, the Chinese team wasted four consecutive counting opportunities and was tied by the opponent. Fortunately, the two still withstood the pressure, scored two points in the first game after 20-20. In the second game, He Jizhen/Tan Qiang was passive in the whole process and was firmly suppressed by the opponent. He eventually lost the game with 13-21. In the deciding game, the two sides fought fiercely, and He Jizhen/Tan Qiang lost 5 points when he led 11-9. In the second half, the Chinese team equalized the match point in the 18-20 behind. At 21-22 and 22-23, the Chinese combination was the point of resolution. The two also wasted 3 chances, and eventually scored 2 points in 25-25. In the first round of the women's doubles, Li Wenmei/Zheng Yu 21-9, 21-8 swept the Indian combination Punnapa/Sky, Dong Wenjing/Feng Xueying 21-15, 21-9 swept the Malaysian combination Xu Jiawen/Ye Yiwen. In the mixed doubles contest, Lu Hao/Chen Lu 22-24, 18-21 lost to No. 5 seed, South Korea combination Xu Chengzai / Cai Wei.
